body: @Release Yup, sounds good. So much better when all the NTR is taken out lol

@Skatlads15 Like I said, my idea was just them both having lost their previous partner (break up/divorce) and over grief ending up talking and then it leading further, nothing to do with "BBC better!!!" or  anything , just them becoming lovers, fucking and having children. Nothing more to it than that.
@Release I mean why else would you want Agil in a hentai other than to play the BBC role? Your idea is better if it's not about that tho ig
@Skatlads15 That's fine, but I would say he becomes a generic black male from him and Asuna falling in love, having sex and children together?
@Release that's fair. Altho i don't really want Agil to be reduced to generic black male from the absolute chad bro he is

@Skatlads15 I didn't say it was, just better than generic rape or ntr. I don't agree, age gap in hentai and what not really doesn't matter. Also their age gap isn't massive. Massive is like an 18 year old and a 60 year old.
@Release oh yeah, ik porn can be as absurd as it wants to be. I was just saying your scenario wasn't quite the best that's all. Still weird considering their massive age difference tho
Skatlads15 They could though, since this is porn? Also so what? That doesn't matter and second who said they wanted Agil x Asuna to be canon??????
@Release I mean that story is plenty retarded in itself as well lol. There's no way the established characters of Asuna and Agil could ever fuck. Especially considering Agil is like twice her age.

Asuna and Agil? That's hot AF. However, the story looks retarded. Why can't it just be Kirito and Asuna broke up and Agil had a divorce from his wife, then Agil and Asuna meet, becomes interested in each other, fuck and have babies together at the end. Instead of "Haha, drug into rape you till you prefer my cock!!!!"
